mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, avatar, gender, theme, login_ip, login_time, phone_number, email FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' AND username = #{username}

SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.gender, sys_user.email, sys_user.phone_number, sys_user.status FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN ${tableName} ON sys_user.id = ${tableName}.user_id WHERE ${tableName}.${fieldName} = #{id} AND sys_user.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY sys_user.id

SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.gender, sys_user.email, sys_user.phone_number, sys_user.status FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN ${tableName} ON sys_user.id = ${tableName}.user_id AND ${tableName}.${fieldName} = #{id} WHERE ${tableName}.${fieldName} IS NULL AND sys_user.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY sys_user.id
